item.description: Ashley resevoir is very beautiful and picturesque. For those who want to walk the entire length it is about five miles. The plan is to walk 2 to 3 miles at a leisurely pace. The intention is to socialize while walking. We will meet at the parking lot of the Elks Lodge. Take 91South to exit 15(Holyoke Mall), bear right to the next light. Proceed through the next light and go up the hill bearing right. The Elks Lodge is on the right.
item.name: Hike at Ashley
